Frequent hearing anomalies: 1 in 20 children under the age of 6

Maternity, 9-month, 24-month, 36-month and nursery school hearing tests

Importance of screening because of the repercussions of hearing loss on neuro-psycho-development

question.question: At what key ages is hearing screening systematically conducted for children?
question.option_a: At birth, 12 months, 24 months, 36 months, and 5 years
question.option_b: At 6 months, 18 months, 30 months, and 48 months
question.option_c: At birth, 9 months, 24 months, 36 months, and nursery school
question.option_d: At 3 months, 15 months, 27 months, and 42 months
